pullRequest.title: KAFKA-9126: KIP-689: StreamJoined changelog configuration
pullRequest.bodyText: Adds withLoggingEnabled and withLoggingDisabled for StreamJoined to give StreamJoined the same flexibility as Materialized

commit.message: remove caching option and add testing

nodes.bodyText: It seems like these would pass by default. Maybe we should check set some log configs and then check that they got propagated ?
I guess both can be declared as final, right?

Suggestion:

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                    final StreamJoined<String, Integer, Integer> streamJoined = StreamJoined.with(Serdes.String(), Serdes.Integer(), Serdes.Integer()).withStoreName("store").withLoggingDisabled();
          
          
            
                    final StreamJoined<String, Integer, Integer> streamJoined = StreamJoined
          
          
            
                        .with(Serdes.String(), Serdes.Integer(), Serdes.Integer())
          
          
            
                        .withStoreName("store")
          
          
            
                        .withLoggingDisabled();
